title: Beautiful B18 Adams and Mowrey For Sale
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: Beautiful B18 Adams and Mowrey For Sale
posts.post_content:
I am offering two beautiful B18 blankets for sale. Both are purple variations. The first is Babe Adams . The second is Mike Mowrey. Both have all 4 brown borders which is critical for the integrity of the blankets. They are both bright and clean with the Mowrey being a little bit nicer, with the Adams having a hint of staining. Both are in excellent consition.
Adams $50.00
Mowrey $60.00

100.00 for both
